data.title: The Unpopular Opinion Thread
data.meta_description: I really enjoyed this thread in the old forum, so I thought why not bring it back to life... Â P-)   This thread always offered good opinions for discussions and gave us many surprises ("wha
data.text:
Post by eismann on

I really enjoyed this thread in the old forum, so I thought why not bring it back to life...

This thread always offered good opinions for discussions and gave us many surprises ("whaaat, you dislike MHE? How dare you?!") - so let's continue

Reminder: This is not a thread to bash Avril but to show different opinions.

I will have a start:

I dont think KHO is that special as many people see it. The lyrics arent special and the instrumental and the melody are pretty boring, imo. I think it's very overrated...

(it does have a good production but that's it)

Post by Sterock85 on

Her lack of interest in reading combined with her admittance that she never spends too long on a song has stopped her from being anything more than a poor to average songwriter. She never has anything interesting to say, she lacks the ability to tell stories and I think she also lacks self awareness which she holds her back as a songwriter.

Post by BogoGog24 on

Here's my unpopular opinion: I like Hello Kitty a lot, kind of as a guilty pleasure song, and I also really like the music video, even if there were things wrong with it like the bad lip synching. I have no idea why but I do.

Post by eismann on

Here's my unpopular opinion: I like Hello Kitty a lot, kind of as a guilty pleasure song, and I also really like the music video, even if there were things wrong with it like the bad lip synching. I have no idea why but I do.

I watched the video only 1 1/2 times. It's so bad that I feel like I should stop being an Avril-Fan, so I decided not to watch it anymore

I still like the song - the verses are great but the chorus is just sooo bad. I only listen to it when I'm alone at home, cause it's better that none knows that this song exists..

Post by sam on

Here's my unpopular opinion: I like Hello Kitty a lot, kind of as a guilty pleasure song, and I also really like the music video, even if there were things wrong with it like the bad lip synching. I have no idea why but I do.

Me too! I think it's super catchy and I actually listen to it often

Post by Becky on

Here's my unpopular opinion: I like Hello Kitty a lot, kind of as a guilty pleasure song, and I also really like the music video, even if there were things wrong with it like the bad lip synching. I have no idea why but I do.

I watched the video only 1 1/2 times. It's so bad that I feel like I should stop being an Avril-Fan, so I decided not to watch it anymore

I still like the song - the verses are great but the chorus is just sooo bad. I only listen to it when I'm alone at home, cause it's better that none knows that this song exists..

I'm the opposite, don't like the verses but love the chorus!

I also think 4 Real is up there with Goodbye for being one of her worst songs. It's a shame because the songs I like on GL and AL are really good (IMO obviously), but the rest of the album really lets the whole thing down.

ETA: I also find Tomorrow quite boring and I don't dislike Don't Tell Me or WYWH but I usually skip them.

Post by jenda358 on

I really enjoyed this thread in the old forum, so I thought why not bring it back to life...

This thread always offered good opinions for discussions and gave us many surprises ("whaaat, you dislike MHE? How dare you?!") - so let's continue

Reminder: This is not a thread to bash Avril but to show different opinions.

I will have a start:

I dont think KHO is that special as many people see it. The lyrics arent special and the instrumental and the melody are pretty boring, imo. I think it's very overrated...

(it does have a good production but that's it)

Exactly. I'm not saying the song is bad, but it's not great either. Avril has many songs that are far better, imo.
